description:
In order to manage system access  
  As an admin user  
  I want to be able to create a new company beneficiary

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I go to the Beneficiaries page
I click on "Add beneficiary" on the page
I click on "Company" tab on the modal Add beneficiary
I select currency "EUR" on the modal
I fill a company beneficiary info in the form
I fill IBAN field with random Austrian IBAN on the modal
I click Add beneficiary on the modal
I should see a success message "Beneficiary has been created"
I should see the new beneficiary on the dashboard

name: Add company beneficiary

description:
In order to manage system access  
  As an admin user  
  I want to be able to create a new individual beneficiary

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I navigate to the Beneficiaries page
I click on "Add beneficiary" to create a beneficiary
I select currency "EUR"
I fill a beneficiary info in the form
I fill IBAN field with random Austrian IBAN
I click Add beneficiary
I should see a success message "Beneficiary has been created"
I should see the new beneficiary at the top of the list

name: Add individual beneficiary

description:
In order to manage system access  
  As an admin user  
  I want to be able to create a new user with full access

elements.name: Create a new user with full access

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I navigate to the Users page
I click on "Add user" to create a user
I fill a user info in the form
I click Add user
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "User created"
I should see the new user at the top of the list

name: Add user with full access

description:
In order to send multiple payments at once  
    As a logged-in user  
    I want to be able to create a new bulk payment

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on "Bulk payments" to create a new bulk payment
I should see the "Bulk payments"
I select "SEPA Transfer"
I upload the file "SEPA bulk payment valid.csv"
I open the wallet dropdown
I click on wallet "AT 3326 GuruPay C2S"
I click "Next" to proceed to the next step
I click "Confirm" to finish
I should see bulk payment "- 6,99 EUR" at current time
I should be on I should be on the page of the wallet "3326" that was used

name: Bulk payment

description:
In order to purchase cryptocurrency conveniently  
  As a logged-in user  
  I want to be able to create a new crypto purchase

I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I navigate to the Crypto page from the menu

I enter "10" as amount in Buy Crypto form

description:
In order to keep my account secure  
  As a user  
  I want to be able to change my password

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on the profile avatar on the home page
I select Settings in the profile menu
I click on the password tab
I click the "Change password" on the change password page
I change password from "111111zZ!" to "111111zZx!"
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "Password was successfully changed!"
I click the "Logout" button for logout
I am on login page
I login again
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on the profile avatar on the home page
I select Settings in the profile menu
I click on the password tab
I click the "Change password" on the change password page
I change password from "111111zZx!" to "111111zZ!"
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "Password was successfully changed!"

name: Change password

description:
In order to exchange transfer
  As a logged-in user
  I want to be able to create a new exchange

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on Exchange to create a new exchange
I should see the exchange form
I enter exchange amount "10"
I open the wallets dropdown in exchange
I select wallet "AT Custom Pooled IFX 3329" in exchange
I open the destination wallets dropdown in exchange
I select destination wallet "AT Custom Pooled IFX 3331" in exchange
I submit the exchange form
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "Conversion has been executed successfully!"
I should be on the home page after exchange
I should see the latest exchange transaction "Currency exchange 10.00 EUR to PLN" at current time

name: Exchanges

description:
In order to access secure system resources  
  As a sub-user  
  I want to be able to generate a valid JWT token

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with sub-user credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on the profile avatar

steps.name: I click on Settings in the profile menu
I click on the Security tab
I click on the "Create token pair" button
I enter "172.31.2.106" into the IP address field
I enter a session name with current date and time
I push "Confirm"
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I save the generated tokens to a file
I click on "Ok, I got it"
I should see the new session in the list

name: JWT Tokens Generation

description:
In order to access my account
  As a registered user
  I want to be able to log in successfully

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see the dashboard

name: Login

description:
In order to get a new payment card
    As a logged-in user
    I want to be able to order a physical card

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on "Order a card" to order a new physical card
I should see the "Order a card" modal window
I select "Physical card" option
I click "Next" to proceed to data entry
I fill in the recipient info form
I select the first country in the list
I fill in the recipient Delivery address form
I select the first delivery method
I click "Next" to go to the static password
I fill a static password
I click "Next" to go to the final modal
I click "Pay" to complete the order
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "Card was successfully ordered."

name: Order a physical card

description:
In order to transfer money
  As a logged-in user
  I want to be able to create a new payment

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click on Send to create a new payment
I select the automation beneficiary
I should see the payment form
I enter payment amount "10"
I select the first purpose code
I enter reference "trest"
I should the "Sign the payment" flag should be enabled by default
I click Create and sign
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I should see a success message "Payment was created successfully"
I should be on the home page
I should see the latest payment at current time

name: Payment to beneficiary

elements.name: Create a new user with full access

I should see a new report at current time

description:
In order to increase my account balance
    As a logged-in user
    I want to be able to top up my wallet from card

elements.name: Create a new top up from card

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click the "Top up" on the page
I click "Choose from list" on the modal
I select "AT 3326 GuruPay C2S" in the dropdown
I click the "Next" on the page
I should see the "How would you like to pay?" on the modal window
I select "Top up from card" method
I enter top up amount "10" in field
I click "Confirm" on the modal window

description:
In order to increase my account balance
    As a logged-in user
    I want to be able to top up my wallet

elements.name: Create a new top up from wallet

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login with valid credentials
I enter the MFA code "111111"
I click the "Top up" button
I click the "Choose from list" dropdown
I select payment wallet "AT 3326 GuruPay C2S"
I click the "Next" button
I should see the "How would you like to pay?" modal
I select "Top up from wallet" payment method
I enter top up amount "10"
I click the Wallet dropdown
I select destination wallet "AT 3318 Wallester"
I click the "Confirm" button
I should see a success message "You have successfully topped up your wallet"
I should see transaction at current time
I should be on wallet page "3326"

name: Top up from wallet
